config-animation.html.title: Animations
config-animation.html.contents: Animation Configuration Related Accoutrement Animate [external] $times (map) scss $times: ( 'fast': 200ms, ); Related Animate Times [external] $changes (map) scss $changes: ( 'text-color': text-decoration-color time('fast') ease('_in-out'), ); Related Animate Changes [external]

config-colors.html.title: Colors
config-colors.html.contents: $brand-colors (Map) scss $brand-colors: ( '_brand-main': hsl(195, 52%, 31%), '_brand-accent': hsl(330, 100%, 45%), '_brand-gray': '#_brand-main' ( 'desaturate': 30%, ), ); The brand is defined by our primary brand blue, along with secondary pink and orange base colors. Color Previews _brand-main #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%) _brand-accent #e60073 rgb(230, 0, 115) hsl(330, 100%, 45%) _brand-gray #3e5860 rgb(62, 88, 96) hsl(194, 22%, 31%) $main-shades (Map) scss $main-shades: shades-of(('_brand-main': color('_brand-main')), 6); Tints and shades of the main brand color. Color Previews _brand-main-dark-6 #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) _brand-main-dark-5 #1e4e5d rgb(30, 78, 93) hsl(194, 51%, 24%) _brand-main-dark-4 #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%) _brand-main-dark-3 #316c7f rgb(49, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%) _brand-main-dark-2 #467b8c rgb(70, 123, 140) hsl(195, 33%, 41%) _brand-main-dark-1 #5b8a99 rgb(91, 138, 153) hsl(195, 25%, 48%) _brand-main-0 #7099a6 rgb(112, 153, 166) hsl(194, 23%, 55%) _brand-main-light-1 #85a8b3 rgb(133, 168, 179) hsl(194, 23%, 61%) _brand-main-light-2 #9ab7c0 rgb(154, 183, 192) hsl(194, 23%, 68%) _brand-main-light-3 #b0c6ce rgb(176, 198, 206) hsl(196, 23%, 75%) _brand-main-light-4 #c5d5db rgb(197, 213, 219) hsl(196, 23%, 82%) _brand-main-light-5 #dae5e8 rgb(218, 229, 232) hsl(193, 23%, 88%) _brand-main-light-6 #eff4f5 rgb(239, 244, 245) hsl(190, 23%, 95%) $accent-shades (Map) scss $accent-shades: shades-of(('_brand-accent': color('_brand-accent')), 6); Tints and shades of the accent brand color. Color Previews _brand-accent-dark-6 #290014 rgb(41, 0, 20) hsl(331, 100%, 8%) _brand-accent-dark-5 #5f002f rgb(95, 0, 47) hsl(330, 100%, 19%) _brand-accent-dark-4 #95004a rgb(149, 0, 74) hsl(330, 100%, 29%) _brand-accent-dark-3 #cb0065 rgb(203, 0, 101) hsl(330, 100%, 40%) _brand-accent-dark-2 #e60073 rgb(230, 0, 115) hsl(330, 100%, 45%) _brand-accent-dark-1 #e80f7b rgb(232, 15, 123) hsl(330, 88%, 48%) _brand-accent-0 #eb2e8c rgb(235, 46, 140) hsl(330, 83%, 55%) _brand-accent-light-1 #ee4d9d rgb(238, 77, 157) hsl(330, 83%, 62%) _brand-accent-light-2 #f16cae rgb(241, 108, 174) hsl(330, 83%, 68%) _brand-accent-light-3 #f48bbf rgb(244, 139, 191) hsl(330, 83%, 75%) _brand-accent-light-4 #f7aad0 rgb(247, 170, 208) hsl(330, 83%, 82%) _brand-accent-light-5 #fac9e1 rgb(250, 201, 225) hsl(331, 83%, 88%) _brand-accent-light-6 #fde8f2 rgb(253, 232, 242) hsl(331, 84%, 95%) $gray-shades (Map) scss $gray-shades: shades-of(('_brand-gray': color('_brand-gray')), 6); Tints and shades of the gray brand color. Color Previews _brand-gray-dark-6 #151d20 rgb(21, 29, 32) hsl(196, 21%, 10%) _brand-gray-dark-5 #30444b rgb(48, 68, 75) hsl(196, 22%, 24%) _brand-gray-dark-4 #3e5860 rgb(62, 88, 96) hsl(194, 22%, 31%) _brand-gray-dark-3 #476068 rgb(71, 96, 104) hsl(195, 19%, 34%) _brand-gray-dark-2 #5a7077 rgb(90, 112, 119) hsl(194, 14%, 41%) _brand-gray-dark-1 #6d8187 rgb(109, 129, 135) hsl(194, 11%, 48%) _brand-gray-0 #809196 rgb(128, 145, 150) hsl(194, 9%, 55%) _brand-gray-light-1 #93a1a6 rgb(147, 161, 166) hsl(196, 10%, 61%) _brand-gray-light-2 #a6b2b5 rgb(166, 178, 181) hsl(192, 9%, 68%) _brand-gray-light-3 #b8c2c5 rgb(184, 194, 197) hsl(194, 10%, 75%) _brand-gray-light-4 #cbd2d4 rgb(203, 210, 212) hsl(193, 9%, 81%) _brand-gray-light-5 #dee2e4 rgb(222, 226, 228) hsl(200, 10%, 88%) _brand-gray-light-6 #f1f3f3 rgb(241, 243, 243) hsl(180, 8%, 95%) $light-theme (Map) scss $light-theme: ( 'background': '#_brand-gray-light-6', 'callout': '#_brand-gray-light-5', 'text-shadow': '#_contrast-light', ); These colors form the basis of the light theme Color Previews background #f1f3f3 rgb(241, 243, 243) hsl(180, 8%, 95%) callout #dee2e4 rgb(222, 226, 228) hsl(200, 10%, 88%) text-shadow #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%) $dark-theme (Map) scss $dark-theme: ( 'background': '#_brand-gray-dark-6', 'callout': '#_brand-gray-dark-5', 'text-shadow': '#_contrast-dark', ); These colors form the basis of the dark theme Color Previews background #151d20 rgb(21, 29, 32) hsl(196, 21%, 10%) callout #30444b rgb(48, 68, 75) hsl(196, 22%, 24%) text-shadow #000000 rgb(0, 0, 0) hsl(0, 0%, 0%) $theme-colors (Map) scss $theme-colors: ( 'text': '#callout' ( 'contrast': append(map-keys($main-shades), 'aaa') ), 'text-light': '#background' ( 'contrast': append(map-keys($gray-shades), 'aa') ), 'text-highlight': '#background' ( 'contrast': append(map-keys($main-shades), 'aa') ), 'border': '#background' ( 'contrast': append(map-keys($gray-shades), 'aa-large') ), 'action': '#callout' ( 'contrast': append(map-keys($accent-shades), 'aa') ), 'action-underline': '#action' ( 'alpha': 0.5 ), 'action-hover': '#callout' ( 'contrast': append(map-keys($accent-shades), 'aaa') ), ); These colors are calculated in relation to the given theme $light-colors (Map) scss $light-colors: map-merge($colors, $light-theme); The full color map for implementing the light-theme Color Previews background #f1f3f3 rgb(241, 243, 243) hsl(180, 8%, 95%) callout #dee2e4 rgb(222, 226, 228) hsl(200, 10%, 88%) text-shadow #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%) text #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) text-light #5a7077 rgb(90, 112, 119) hsl(194, 14%, 41%) text-highlight #316c7f rgb(49, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%) border #6d8187 rgb(109, 129, 135) hsl(194, 11%, 48%) action #95004a rgb(149, 0, 74) hsl(330, 100%, 29%) action-underline #95004a rgba(149, 0, 74, 0.5) hsla(330, 100%, 29%, 0.5) action-hover #5f002f rgb(95, 0, 47) hsl(330, 100%, 19%) $dark-colors (Map) scss $dark-colors: map-merge($colors, $dark-theme); The full color map for implementing the dark-theme Color Previews background #151d20 rgb(21, 29, 32) hsl(196, 21%, 10%) callout #30444b rgb(48, 68, 75) hsl(196, 22%, 24%) text-shadow #000000 rgb(0, 0, 0) hsl(0, 0%, 0%) text #dae5e8 rgb(218, 229, 232) hsl(193, 23%, 88%) text-light #809196 rgb(128, 145, 150) hsl(194, 9%, 55%) text-highlight #5b8a99 rgb(91, 138, 153) hsl(195, 25%, 48%) border #5a7077 rgb(90, 112, 119) hsl(194, 14%, 41%) action #f48bbf rgb(244, 139, 191) hsl(330, 83%, 75%) action-underline #f48bbf rgba(244, 139, 191, 0.5) hsla(330, 83%, 75%, 0.5) action-hover #fac9e1 rgb(250, 201, 225) hsl(331, 83%, 88%)

config-fonts.html.title: Fonts
config-fonts.html.contents: Font Configuration Related Accoutrement Type [external] $body-font scss $body-font: ( 'name': 'freight-text-pro', 'stack': ( 'Baskerville', 'Palatino', 'Cambria', 'Georgia', 'serif', ), 'source': 'https://typekit.com/fonts/freight-text', ); Freight Text Pro is the primary font of the OddBird brand. Font Preview freight-text-pro (body) css font-family: freight-text-pro, Baskerville, Palatino, Cambria, Georgia, serif; $code-font scss $code-font: ( 'name': 'Dank Mono', 'normal': ( 'woff2': 'dankmono/dankmono-regular-webfont', 'woff': 'dankmono/dankmono-regular-webfont', ), 'italic': ( 'woff2': 'dankmono/dankmono-italic-webfont', 'woff': 'dankmono/dankmono-italic-webfont', ), 'stack': ( 'Consolas', 'Menlo', 'Monaco', 'Lucida Console', 'Liberation Mono', 'DejaVu Sans Mono', 'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono', 'Courier New', 'monospace', ), ); A readable monospace font for code previews Font Preview Dank Mono (code) css font-family: 'Dank Mono', Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, 'Lucida Console', 'Liberation Mono', 'DejaVu Sans Mono', 'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono', 'Courier New', monospace; $amp-font scss $amp-font: ( 'name': 'amp', 'stack': ( 'freight-text-pro', 'Baskerville', 'Palatino', 'Cambria', 'Georgia', 'serif', ), 'italic': ( 'woff2': 'data:application/font-woff2;charset=utf-8;base64,', 'woff': 'data:application/font-woff;charset=utf-8;base64,', ), ); Baskerville Italic provides a nice-looking ampersand

config-grids.html.title: Grids
config-grids.html.contents: Grid Configuration Related Accoutrement Core [external] $grid-sizes (map) scss $grid-sizes: ( '_space': minmax(0, 1fr), '_quarter': minmax(0, size('quarter')), ); $grid-lines (map) scss $grid-lines: ( '_lines-l': full-start left-start, '_lines-m': left-end midpoint right-start, '_lines-r': right-end full-end, ); $grid-left (map) scss $grid-left: ( '_content-l': [content-start] #_space, '_edge-l': size('grid-margin') #_content-l, '_main-l': #_quarter [half-left] #_quarter, '_left': #_edge-l [main-start] #_main-l, ); $grid-right (map) scss $grid-right: ( '_content-r': #_space [content-end], '_edge-r': #_content-r size('grid-margin'), '_main-r': #_quarter [half-right] #_quarter, '_right': #_main-r [main-end] #_edge-r, ); $grid-areas (map) scss $grid-areas: ( '_main': #_main-l [#_lines-m] #_main-r, '_main-sm': #_main-l [midpoint] #_main-r, '_content': #_content-l [main-start] #_main [main-end] #_content-r, '_full': #_edge-l [main-start] #_main [main-end] #_edge-r, '_full-sm-main': [main-start right-start] #_main-sm [left-end main-end], '_full-sm': #_edge-l #_full-sm-main #_edge-r, ); $grid-layouts (map) scss $grid-layouts: ( 'content': [#_lines-l] #_content [#_lines-r], 'full': [#_lines-l] #_full [#_lines-r], 'small': [#_lines-l] #_full-sm [#_lines-r], 'main': [#_lines-l main-start] #_main [main-end #_lines-r], 'main-left': [#_lines-l ] #_left [#_lines-m] #_main-r [main-end #_lines-r], 'main-right': [#_lines-l main-start] #_main-l [#_lines-m] #_right, 'left': [#_lines-l] #_left [#_lines-m main-end #_lines-r], 'right': [#_lines-l main-start #_lines-m] #_right [#_lines-r], );

config-patterns.html.title: Patterns
config-patterns.html.contents: Border Configuration Related Accoutrement Core [external] $borders (map) scss $borders: ( 'section': size('section-border') solid var-color('border'), ); Related @function border() Used By @function border() $shadows (map) scss $shadows: ( 'dark': 0 -1px 0, 'light': 0 1px 0, ); Related @function shadow() Used By @function shadow()

config-scale.html.title: Ratios & Sizes
config-scale.html.contents: Scale Configuration Related Accoutrement Scale [external] $modular-scale scss $modular-scale: ( 'text-ratio': 1.4, ); Ratio text-ratio (1.4) Step Value -3 0.36 -2 0.51 -1 0.71  base 1 1.4 2 1.96 3 2.74 $text-sizes scss $text-sizes: ( 'root': 18px, 'responsive': calc(#root + 0.5vw), 'large-root': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': 1, ), 'large': calc(1rem + 0.25vw), 'xlarge': calc(#large-root + 4.5vw), 'small': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': -0.5, ), 'xsmall': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': -1, ), 'code': 0.875em, 'intro': '#large', 'h1': '#xlarge', 'h2': '#large', ); Size Previews Name Value root 18px Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. responsive calc(18px + 0.5vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. large-root 1.4rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. large, intro, h2 calc(1rem + 0.25vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. xlarge, h1 calc(1.4rem + 4.5vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. small 0.8451542547rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. xsmall 0.7142857143rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. code 0.875em Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. $spacing-sizes scss $spacing-sizes: ( 'rhythm': '#root' ( 'text-ratio': 1, 'convert-units': 'rem', ), 'gutter': '#rhythm', 'double-gutter': '#gutter' ( 'times': 2, ), 'spacer': calc(#double-gutter + 6vmin), 'shim': '#gutter' ( 'times': 0.5, ), 'half-shim': '#shim' ( 'times': 0.5, ), 'quarter-shim': '#shim' ( 'times': 0.25, ), ); Size Previews Name Value rhythm, gutter 1.4rem double-gutter 2.8rem spacer calc(2.8rem + 6vmin) shim 0.7rem half-shim 0.35rem quarter-shim 0.175rem $component-sizes scss $component-sizes: ( 'icon': 1em, 'section-border': '#half-shim', 'grid-margin': size('shim'), ); Size Previews Name Value icon 1em section-border 0.35rem grid-margin 0.7rem $page-sizes scss $page-sizes: ( 'page': 36rem, 'half': '#page' ( 'divide': 2, ), 'quarter': '#page' ( 'divide': 4, ), 'calendar': '#page' ( 'divide': 3, ), ); Size Previews Name Value page 36rem half 18rem quarter 9rem calendar 12rem $breakpoints scss $breakpoints: ( 'page-break': '#page' ( 'convert-units': 'browser-ems', ), 'wide': '#page-break' ( 'times': 1.5, ), ); Size Previews Name Value page-break 40.5em wide 60.75em

index.html.title: Miriam Suzanne Documentation
index.html.contents: View Project mia eleventy source for miriamsuzanne.com Develop: Install dependencies: yarn Compile and run Eleventy server, with a watcher for Sass files: gulp The site will be compiled into _site/ for netlify deployment, and the served site will be available at localhost:8080 or e.g. mia.hexxie.com:8080. You can also run individual commands: # build the static site gulp build # run the server gulp serve # minify images gulp imagemin # compile sass gulp sass # lint sass gulp sasslint # format sass gulp prettier # compile sass docs gulp sassdoc # watch sass files (lint & docs & compile) gulp watch Sass Docs are compiled into the _site/style/ folder, which is then available at the URL: /style/.

tools-grid-vars.html.title: CSS Grid Variables
tools-grid-vars.html.contents: Grids  CSS Variables Related Accoutrement Core: CSS Variables [external] $grid-var-prefix (string) scss $grid-var-prefix: 'grid-'; Set a prefix for all grid-tokens, and well apply it when setting or calling css variables based on your grid maps. Set to null or '' (empty string) for no prefix. Used By @mixin grids--() @mixin grid--() @function var-grid() @mixin grids--() Convert any grid-map into CSS variables, using the global $grid-var-prefix. Parameters & Output $source: $grids (map) Optionally use a custom map of grids to set as css variables {CSS output} (code block) Custom properties for all public grids in the map Requires $grid-var-prefix (string) @mixin grid--() Set a single custom property based on a map-color, with optional alias and fallback Parameters $grid: (*) Color name available in the $source map, or alias to use in naming the CSS variable $value: null (string | null) Optional value for the variable, if different from the given $grid $fallback: true (*) The optional fallback value for a var() function: true will generate a fallback based on the token value A token name will fallback to the value of that css-variable and then to the tokens calculated value Any other fallback will be passed through unchanged $source: $grids (map) Optional map of grids to use as a palette source Requires $grid-var-prefix (string) @function var-grid() Access the CSS variable associated with a given token, along with a fallback value based on the token itself Parameters & Return $grid: (*) Color name available in the $source map $fallback: true (*) The optional fallback value for a var() function: true will generate a fallback based on the token value A token name will fallback to the value of that css-variable and then to the tokens calculated value Any other fallback will be passed through unchanged $source: (map) Optional Accoutrement map of grids to use as source @return (string) CSS variable call, in the format: var(--<token>, <fallback>) Requires $grid-var-prefix (string)

tools-grids.html.title: Grids
tools-grids.html.contents: Grid Tools Related Accoutrement Core [external] $grids (map) scss $grids: () !default; Used By @function grid() @mixin add-grid() @function grid() Parameters & Return $key: (string) grid token key @return (*) compiled grid token value Requires $grids (map) @mixin add-grid() Parameters $map: (map) grid map partial to merge into $grids global Requires $grids (map)

tools-patterns.html.title: Patterns
tools-patterns.html.contents: Patterns Tools Related Accoutrement Core [external] $borders (map) scss $borders: () !default; @function border() Parameters & Return $key: (string) border token key @return (*) compiled border token value Requires $borders (map) $shadows (map) scss $shadows: () !default; @function shadow() Parameters & Return $key: (string) border token key @return (*) compiled border token value Requires $shadows (map)
